sentence.Network_en: Say's writings reached a wide audience during his lifetime.
sentence.Network_cn: 在塞伊有生之年，他的作品拥有大量的读者。

sentence.Network_en: His writings were marked by an extraordinary lucidity and elegance of style.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的作品简洁明晰，文风典雅。

sentence.Network_en: There is a curious thing about her writings in this period.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在这期间的著作与以往有所不同。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A strong sense of patriotism pervaded his writings ., 一种强烈的爱国主义感情渗透在他的作品中.
writings of portrait painting in Qing Dynasty ., 清代肖像画著述.
a printed anthology of the works of one author or of writings on related subjects作家选集一个作家的或有关同一主题的作品的印刷汇编

entry.def: Writing is something that has been written or printed.

example.ex: 'It's from a notebook,' the sheriff said, 'And there's writing on it.'...
example.tran: “这是在一个笔记本里找到的，”法官道，“上面还有文字。”

example.ex: If you have a complaint about your holiday, please inform us in writing.
example.tran: 如果您对您的假日有什么意见，请书面告知我们。

entry.tran: (尤指评论语言风格时的)文字作品，文章
entry.def: You can refer to any piece of written work as writing, especially when you are considering the style of language used in it.

example.ex: The writing is brutally tough and savagely humorous...
example.tran: 该作品带有残酷的强悍和野性的幽默感。

example.ex: It was such a brilliant piece of writing.
example.tran: 这真是一篇才华横溢的文章。

entry.tran: (尤指为赚取稿费而进行的)写作
entry.def: Writing is the activity of writing, especially of writing books for money.

example.ex: She had begun to be a little bored with novel writing.
example.tran: 她开始对写小说有些厌倦了。

example.ex: ...activities to help prepare children for writing.
example.tran: 帮助孩子准备写作的活动

entry.def: Your writing is the way that you write with a pen or pencil, which can usually be recognized as belonging to you.

example.ex: It was a little difficult to read your writing...
I think it's due to being left handed that he's got terrible writing.
example.tran: 我想他的书写这么糟糕是因为他是左撇子。

entry.tran: (尤指某一作者有关某一专题的全部)著作，作品
entry.def: An author's writings are all the things that he or she has written, especially on a particular subject.

example.ex: Althusser's writings are focused mainly on France...
example.tran: 阿尔都塞的著作主要是论述法国的。

example.ex: The pieces he is reading are adapted from the writings of Michael Frayn.
example.tran: 他目前阅读的作品改编自迈克尔·弗雷恩的著作。

entry.tran: 凶兆毕现；有大难临头的预兆
entry.def: If you say that the writing is on the wall, you mean that there are clear signs that a situation is going to become very difficult or unpleasant.

example.ex: The writing is clearly on the wall. If we do nothing about it, we shall only have ourselves to blame.
example.tran: 凶兆显而易见。如果我们对此毫无行动，就只能怨自己了。

means.word_mean: 1. the third of three divisions of the Hebrew Scriptures

auth_sentence.content: This is fully documented by Einstein's own writings.

auth_sentence.content: Descartes certainly played down his own purely philosophical writings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Descartes certainly played down his own purely philosophical writings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Descartes certainly played down his own purely philosophical writings.

Sentence.sentence: J's (Biography of John Muir)-John Muir's own writings to bring readers a life story of this remarkable man who did so much to raise American's awareness of environmental issues.
